description: A city of the Siculi on the northern coast of Sicily.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Casale di Tripi

properties.description: Ruins near the city of Tripi that have been associated with the ancient settlement of Abacaenum. Location based on a representative point derived from an OpenStreetMap node.

names.description: Name of the modern city in Sicily that is thought to be in the area of the ancient settlement of Abakainon.
names.details: Tripi is suggested to be the closest modern place to the ancient settlement of Abakainon by both Manni (1981) and the BTCGI. The Barrington Atlas refers, more specifically, to the area of Casale di Tripi.

references.formattedCitation: Wikipedia: L’enciclopedia libera e collaborativa (2001-), Tripi.

names.description: Italian name of the ancient city of Abakainon.
